messages.text: Arc is so amazing and kewl and silly and awesome and great and fun and beautiful and breathtaking and hilarious and nice and cosy ðŸ’œ
messages.author: Schnig

messages.text: I want to thankyou not just as an individual but as a conglomerate. We as a community unit together under your joy, your happiness, your dedication to your fans and to yourself. We have been here for your highest, And through the lowest through the tough times and through the most joyous times. But now we come together to celebrate something even more special a absolute massive milestone for any individual within this industry we stand together thanks to you and Thanks to the dedication that you have put in. Here to this milestone and many many more to come. Order
messages.author: Courageous Mongoose

messages.text: ARC, THANK YOU FOR ALL YOU'VE DONE. Also congrats on 1 year of vtubing I speak for all of us when I say this part but I'm glad I found you thank you for being so kind and accepting to us. I appreciate the time you've spent with us (even if you hate me [jk]). You deserve everything you've gotten so far, we'll continue to support you as you continue streaming. Please keep being yourself and don't change, we appreciate you the way you are, keep going you'll 100% get to 2k next year. Thanks again and have a nice 1 year stream anniversary stinky- I mean Arc. <3 ps: I don't hate you - Much love Vegito
messages.author: Vegito

messages.text: Arc, for the past couple months I've known you, you've been hopelessly horrible at everything gaming lmao, but that personality I see in every stream makes even the worst gamer you are, 100 times better than a good gamer with no personalityâ€¦ I'm here to tell you, happy anniversary and I hope you have a wonderful couple more anniversaries to come! - Moldy
messages.author: Moldy

messages.text: Happy Strim Anniversary Arc! From me personally, and from the bitlings as a collective, thank you sooo so much for everything you do! You've created a wonderful community and it's the community that I feel most a part of online. Please keep being you! You're a wonderful entertainer and a wonderful person! Please please please remember that the bitling army is a loyal one, and we will never leave your side! Here's to another year! From Hobbit <3
messages.author: H0b81t

messages.text: Hello Arc! I hope you are feeling wonderful. Congratulations on your affiliate anniversary! I'm glad I got to meet you on that "divorce" stream, though it'd be awesome to find you even earlier! This anniversary reminds me that I missed almost a year of your streams. You are awesome Arc, don't let the voices in your head fool you! You are funny, you are sincere, you are lovely. I'll do my best to keep reminding you all these but if you are ever feeling down with no bitlings around you, remember that we all appreciate you. We appreciate that you do your best to spend time with us, we appreciate that you try your best to stream. We all know it doesn't always work out and that's okay, we understand. We will be here, waiting for you, don't even worry about it! Just make sure you are taking care of yourself. I don't know if it means anything but, we are all proud of you! I can't wait to watch you celebrate more and more anniversaries, let's keep stacking them!
messages.author: RabbitTheDevil

messages.text: Arc!!! Thank you for streaming for a WHOLE ONE YEAR!!! It's not easy keeping at it for such a long time and I'm proud of you for doing so. I'm happy to have found you and everyone else through Rabbit and I don't regret a single moment. I hope you keep going at it and stream for another 9 years!!! uhhhhh i'm also really bad with saying things so uhhhhhhhh hello yes hi me piss
messages.author: Sheeno

messages.text: This time one year ago an amazing digital cat started her journey to become the silliest of all the vtubers and today one year later she made so many friends and day by day grew sillier and sillier, thanks arc I'm sorry I can't make it to every stream but I always cherish every stream I make it to. From the weirdest bucket, thank you and once again happy one year streaming anniversary.
messages.author: TheBucketMaster

messages.text: HAPPY 1 YEARS ANNIVERSARY ARC ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽŠðŸŽŠ Congratulations on your 1 year journey that you have accomplished and the community you build along the way ( to take over the world XD.) It's also nice that I got the chance to meet another cool, amazing and comfy streamer ( yes ðŸ«µ Arc) and Although sometimes I'm lurking it's always so much fun hanging out with everyone, even when I miss your streams I'll always wish you have a GREAT STREAM ðŸ’šðŸ’šðŸ’š from the void hehe. messages.author: LinkKnight

messages.text: I know I usually lurk, but it is always a delight to tune in to your streams. It's such a pleasant place to simply exist for a while without worrying about everything else going on in life. Your personality, vibe, and voice create this perfect mix of comfort and fun - It's so easy to just sit back and enjoy the moment whenever your stream is on; You have a welcoming presence that's hard to put into words, so I hope turning you into a literal cat conveys it better :3 Thanks for creating a space that feels so easy to return to, and so comfortable just to be in. I'm looking forward to all the streams still to come <3
messages.author: Jay

messages.text: Happy anniversary Rc racing car Arcy. Yes I am aware that I am the most stinkiest person in the server for showering once every 2 weeks but I'm willing to support the funny bri'ish catto from the sidelines. It has been fun, and I wish you the best in all future endeavors. - Loved by this cunt, Hunter
messages.author: HunterYT

messages.text: Thank you so much for randomly popping up on my twitch timeline. My first day finding out about you was one of the best days I've experienced, you were so funny and welcoming, I felt at home and you almost instantly became one of my oshis. You've always interacted with as many people as you can, you never make anybody feel left out, and you're one of the sweetest streamers on the platform! You truly have no idea just how much you're loved and how much we as a community care for you. You've built a home with tons of friends! We'll always be grateful for you with all you do. Surviving through the hard times, coming back stronger, and wearing a smile upon your face. You're an inspiration, a hero, and a friend to a lot of people. To me, specifically, you may not be a perfect individual, but that's what I love about you (no parasocial tho :3) You're caring, you're sweet, you have a heart of gold, and you deserve all the best things in life. You had helped me, made my days brighter when they were dim, never failed to make me laugh or smile, and you have true talent. The fact you've come so far is beautiful and something you should be extremely proud of, just like how we all are! We're so proud of you and your work!! Please never give up, keep pushing forward, reach your goals, and continue being you! Because we love you for who you are
messages.author: CherryViDarlin

messages.text: Arc! I know we just recently met and became friends but it feels like we have known each other for years now, I love you and all my girlies! I'm proud of you for always doing your best and for reaching 1 year!! MORE YEARS TO COME LETSGOOOO! I am excited and hyped to see what will happen in the years to come. Remember, you can always rely on us just like how we can rely on you. We will always be here! No matter what happens, we will always be supportive of whatever you wanna do >w< Love youuuuu lotssss!!! ãƒ¾(â‰§â–½â‰¦*)o
messages.author: Alien Ai

messages.text: Congrats for this first year of streaming Archi! I may still be a fairly new Bitling, but I must admit I really enjoy being in this community you've built, even as lurker who mostly stays in the walls! I can feel you're a good person, and I love your vibes. Here's to 1 year, and many more to come! Also I'm giving you this Joltik! Her name is Arcantik and she'll love being your desk companion! She's not picky too, so to feed her if you have an electrical outlet it'll be fine :P Take care, and keep being awesome. - Tigy
messages.author: KnightOfTigers

messages.text: Arc, where do I even startâ€¦ You've done so amazing this year. You built such a wholesome, welcoming community, made new friends, and tried new things. I'm really glad I met you, Arc. You're such an amazing person to talk to <insert Arc heart emote> you're cute, silly, kind, and just have this thing that makes everyone around you feel way better. And don't forget the clicky noises of the keyboard THEY ARE THE BEST, just like your voice when you speak and sing. Whether I'm having a rough day or just bing chilling, talking with you and the community always makes everything better. Time flies way too fast when I'm around you and chat. Thank you for being so kind, funny, and caring you make everyone feel seen and appreciated. I'm so glad I can be here and love every second of being with chat and watching you play, draw, chat, or rage over things. Thank you, Arc, for being in our lives. You seriously deserve all the love and good things coming your way. Arc is cute, adorable, caring, kind, loving, wholesome, comforting, chaotic (sometimes), funny, cozy, silly â€” and don't forget OUR PRECIOUS BEAN. Mhm, pass it on. I can't wait for the next anniversary!!! The drinkable yoghurt in the basement fridge ðŸ’šðŸ’šðŸ’š
messages.author: DrinkYoghurt

messages.text: HAPPY ANNIVERSARY ARC!!!!! It's already been 1 year and I hope there will be many more to come! Thank you Arc for every single amazing stream you've given us. Thank you for the community days you've arranged, which were very chaotic, but very fun in the end. The world needs more people like you, you're one of the kindest and sweetest people I have ever met in my life. You always look out for other people and you ALWAYS cheer them up if they are down. You are a very welcoming person that could make any person smile. It's always fun to tune it to your streams, even if I don't chat often. Truly has been a wonderful year with you. I hope you're having a great day today, smiling and having fun, cause you deserve it all, for all of the trouble and work you've gone through to give us absolute PEAK streams every time, and to whoever says otherwise I say OFF WITH HIS HEAD. You've survived streaming for a year and I sure as hell hope you'll continue streaming. I wish you best of luck with your streams and your career as a VTuber, and I am looking forward for your future streams. Always remember that you ArCANthabyte (sorry, had to add a pun) do anything, as long as you never give up! I am really thankful for everything you've done for us, and I hope you understand how much your effort means to us. Please don't stop being yourself because you are WONDERFUL. Don't worry about who I am right now Â¯\_(ãƒ„)_/Â¯
messages.author: Anonymogus

messages.text: My dear Arc First of all - happy anniversary!! You have gotten so far in this year and Im so proud of you. You are a truly amazing person, beautiful, honest and genuine. Meeting you was truly a blessing and I never imagined I could ever find someone so amazing and have them as a best friend on top of that! You've been nothing but kind to everyone around you and I know how hard you work, how tough times can get but you're still always there doing your best. You have build a community of people who love you so so much for who you are - your silly humor, beautiful voice, adorable laugh and warmness. You deserve everything that's good and I mean that. You will make your dreams come true and you've got more than it takes to get to the very top and i'll be there, watching you, supporting you every step of the way. Keep being yourself because that's the perfect version of you that I wouldn't change for anything. I love you so so much and I am lucky to have met you. Keep going because it's worth it! Thank you for being here and being my best friend. Yuki Arcsimptsuki (ã€‚â€¢Ì€á´—-)Ùˆ Ì‘Ì‘âœ§
messages.author: Da Yuki

messages.text: Happy anniversary to my favourite person, my biggest inspiration, and my forever player two AND MY BEST FRIEND!! ðŸ’« Watching you grow, stream after stream, has been one of the most beautiful things I've ever experienced. From the small moments to the late night laughs, the scuffed tech issues (that happen in almost every stream), the inside jokes, to the big moments like building a whole community (raiding Matara Kan) and finding real friendships through what you love and I am so thankful for these friendships especially Yuki, the bond you two have is amazing and I love the energy the OG pussy pals give. I've seen all of your sides to streaming and I've loved every single second. ðŸ’— You've built something incredible, not just online but in the hearts of everyone who watches you. You bring joy, laughter, and comfort to so many people and I'm beyond proud to stand beside you through it all and continue to be your biggest supporter ever! Through the good days, the tough ones, the wins, and the L's! I'll always be here, cheering for you louder than anyone else. ðŸŽ®ðŸ’ž Here's to more streams, more dreams, more laughter, and another year of doing life (and this crazy adventure) together. We love you ARC keep pushing daily and keep that chin up arc you froggy
messages.author: Elmo <3

messages.text: Yes, the first message was kind of for laughs, but I will be honest now. I want to just say how genuinely incredible it has been to be a part of this community, with a streamer like you, Arc. You are one of the greatest people IÂ´ve met in my entire life, and I donÂ´t even want to imagine where IÂ´d be in life if not for you and everyone else. I can only wish that you have the best life possible, no matter what, because throughout all of my time knowing you, I learned that you deserve absolutely nothing less. You are an incredible streamer, and I hope you know that. Truly, thank you for everything.
messages.author: Schnig

messages.text: I'm not really good at this, so I'mma make this short. I've only known you for a short time, but you seem like a great and fun person, based on what I've seen. I enjoy the banter between you and the chat, as well as how you express yourself. You may not be that confident on some stuff (ex. your voice), but I believe you're fine as you are right now. If you feel like it's not, then it's just about to go up from here! - Abcedef the Alphabet PS: I am unsure when I first met you, but I do remember the first stream I watched. Pokemon Smash or Pass. you had some... interesting choices.
messages.author: Abcedef

messages.text: I personally haven't been around as long as the other but I did enjoy the short time that I spent watching you made me realised how talented you are, you managed to build an awesome community with your efforts that just shows how dedicated you were and the amount of effort and time you spent working! Seeing how everyone is gathering together to support you just shows the milestones that you have achieved, so please continue being who you are as that's what were here for because you're gaming skills don't exist. HAPPY FIRST ANNIVERSARY!!! And thank you so much for everything you do, you might not know but you did manage to make someone do better! - Love by maiden kaiden
messages.author: Kaiden xx

messages.text: God has forbid me from staying on topic for longer than a sentence or two, wont stop me from writing about my oshi :3 Didn't know I had a happiness switch, but the "Start Streaming" on your OBS seems to have found it. Id trade a million just to see the Live notification another time. I look up to you now, more literally so when you're streaming from your penthouse in a few years. I Wish You Success. An Arc stream a day takes the sad away, though even Joy needs time to breath. For all of our sakes aswell, don't be afraid to turn on Sleep mode more often. I Wish You Health. Tried to write a book for all the reasons to watch Arc, Unfortunately there wasn't enough paper on earth.. Switched to digital, now I need another NAS. while this community is still just a small little corner of the internet.. its MY CORNER, I LIKE IT, I FEEL SAFE AND LAUGH CONSTANTLY. >:) As my extrEMELY, limited creative battery runs dry, ill end it here, I'll sleep soundly, knowing you'll be right there once I power back on. To another year of cringes, laughs, and nuclear fallout, and then a 100 years more. Cheers!
messages.author: Lyriqal

messages.text: i wish i can gift 200 subs that a promise and thank you you've done and pretty much change my life too so this and sorry make it short thank you ARC WE LOVE YOU and congrats HAPPY 1 year arc and you will be best vtuber EVER!!! _skull p.s and I'm serious about the 200 subs

messages.text: i wanna say u are one of the sweetest fronds! u have been an awesome presence in my life and to many others! please love urself and know that u are also loved and cared about MUAHHH
